text: Bundin () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Kamennoyarsky Selsoviet, Chernoyarsky District, Astrakhan Oblast, Russia. The population was 22 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located on the Volga River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Chernoyarsky District
title: Bundin
